author: COMSOL
description: This model demonstrates the application of COMSOL Multiphysics to a benchmark case of steady-state subsurface fluid flow and transient solute transport along a vertical cross section in an unconfined aquifer. Solute transport is subjected to highly irregular flow conditions with strong anisotropic dispersion.
label: aquifer_water_table.mph
name: root
